title: webdav display issue / possible client resync / encryption issue?
body:
hi,
i am really struggling now, i have finally got encryption enabled and working after a lot of pain, and now webdav seems to be having a big issue displaying files. put as simply as i can, if i add a new file to the client sync folder, whilst it is uploading the webdav shows no files at all. once it has uploaded if i hit refresh once, i will get 1 file listed, if i then refresh again i get the first file plus the next file and so on and so on. sorry if this is not very well explained or in the wrong thread. 

my owncloud.log shows:

```
{"app":"search_lucene","message":"failed to extract meta information for \/boseley\/files\/new text document.txt: unable to determine file format","level":2,"time":"2013-08-16t07:54:05+00:00"}

{"app":"php","message":"stream_wrapper_register(): protocol crypt:\/\/ is already defined. at c:\\inetpub\\wwwroot\\apps\\files_encryption\\appinfo\\app.php#28","level":2,"time":"2013-08-16t08:01:50+00:00"}
```

the files seem to be getting uploaded and encrypted but i am unsure as to why the web browser shows incorrect. i am also getting a prompt about re-syncing everything  from scratch appear randomly, i can not pinpoint what makes it happen but it prompts and asks if i wish to "keep my files" or "remove all files" and do a fresh sync. it also states something about a fresh sync possibly being requested from the server and this is when it gives me the option to keep or remove all files.
